adjectives.description: professorial (comparative more professorial, superlative most professorial)

entries.meaning: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a professor or professors, or of a professorship or professorships.
examples: Adamant that women could not enter the professorial fraternity, Cornell [University] did not appoint any women professors until 1911 and then only in home economics. Comstock regained her professorial title only in 1913, after working for many years as a lecturer (Conable 127, 130).
